verses.verse: When you <S%H3427>sit<s%> to <S%H3898>eat<s%> with a <S%H4910>ruler<s%>, <S%H995>consider<s%> <S%H995>diligently<s%> what is before <S%H6440>you<s%>:
And <S%H7760>put<s%> a <S%H7915>knife<s%> to your <S%H3930>throat<s%>, if you be a man <S%H1167>given<s%> to <S%H5315>appetite<s%>.
Be not <S%H183>desirous<s%> of his <S%H4303>dainties<s%>: for they are <S%H3577>deceitful<s%> <S%H3899>food<s%>.
<S%H3021>Labor<s%> not to be <S%H6238>rich<s%>: <S%H2308>cease<s%> from your own <S%H998>wisdom<s%>.

Will you <S%H5774>set<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> upon that which is <S%H6213>not<s%>? for riches certainly <S%H6213>make<s%> themselves <S%H3671>wings<s%>; they fly <S%H5774>away<s%> as a <S%H5404>eagle<s%> toward <S%H8064>heaven<s%>.
<S%H3898>Eat<s%> you not the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of him that has a <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H5869>eye<s%>, neither <S%H183>desire<s%> you his dainty <S%H4303>meats<s%>:
For as he <S%H8176>thinks<s%> in his <S%H5315>heart<s%>, so is <S%H398>he<s%>: Eat and <S%H8354>drink<s%>, <S%H559>says<s%> he to <S%H3820>you<s%>; but his heart is not with you.
The <S%H6595>morsel<s%> which you have <S%H398>eaten<s%> shall you vomit <S%H6958>up<s%>, and <S%H7843>lose<s%> your <S%H5273>sweet<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%>.
<S%H1696>Speak<s%> not in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of a <S%H3684>fool<s%>: for he will <S%H936>despise<s%> the <S%H7922>wisdom<s%> of your <S%H4405>words<s%>.
<S%H5253>Remove<s%> not the <S%H5769>old<s%> <S%H1366>landmark<s%>; and <S%H935>enter<s%> not into the <S%H7704>fields<s%> of the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%>:
For their <S%H1350>redeemer<s%> is <S%H2389>mighty<s%>; he shall <S%H7378>plead<s%> their cause with <S%H7379>you<s%>.
<S%H935>Apply<s%> your <S%H3820>heart<s%> unto <S%H4148>instruction<s%>, and your <S%H241>ears<s%> to the <S%H561>words<s%> of <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>.
<S%H4513>Withhold<s%> not <S%H4148>correction<s%> from the <S%H5288>child<s%>: for if you <S%H5221>beat<s%> him with the <S%H7626>rod<s%>, he shall not <S%H4191>die<s%>.
You shall <S%H5221>beat<s%> him with the <S%H7626>rod<s%>, and shall <S%H5337>deliver<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> from <S%H7585>hell<s%>.
My <S%H1121>son<s%>, if your <S%H3820>heart<s%> be <S%H2449>wise<s%>, my <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%>, even <S%H589>mine<s%>.
<S%H3629>Yes<s%>, my mind shall <S%H5937>rejoice<s%>, when your <S%H8193>lips<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> right <S%H4339>things<s%>.
Let not your <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H7065>envy<s%> <S%H2400>sinners<s%>: but be you in the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> all the day <S%H3117>long<s%>.
For surely there <S%H3426>is<s%> a <S%H319>end<s%>; and your <S%H8615>expectation<s%> shall not be cut <S%H3772>off<s%>.
<S%H8085>Hear<s%> <S%H1121>you<s%>, my son, and be <S%H2449>wise<s%>, and <S%H833>guide<s%> your <S%H3820>heart<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%>.
Be not among <S%H3196>winebibbers<s%>; among riotous <S%H2151>eaters<s%> of <S%H1320>flesh<s%>:
For the <S%H5433>drunkard<s%> and the <S%H2151>glutton<s%> shall come to <S%H3423>poverty<s%>: and <S%H5124>drowsiness<s%> shall <S%H3847>clothe<s%> a man with <S%H7168>rags<s%>.
<S%H8085>Listen<s%> unto your <S%H1>father<s%> that <S%H3205>fathered<s%> <S%H936>you<s%>, and despise not your <S%H517>mother<s%> when she is <S%H2204>old<s%>.
<S%H7069>Buy<s%> the <S%H571>truth<s%>, and <S%H4376>sell<s%> it <S%H2451>not<s%>; also wisdom, and <S%H4148>instruction<s%>, and <S%H998>understanding<s%>.
The <S%H1>father<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall <S%H1524>greatly<s%> <S%H1523>rejoice<s%>: and he that <S%H3205>fathers<s%> a <S%H2450>wise<s%> child shall have joy of <S%H8055>him<s%>.
Your <S%H1>father<s%> and your <S%H517>mother<s%> shall be <S%H8055>glad<s%>, and she that <S%H3205>bore<s%> you shall <S%H1523>rejoice<s%>.
My <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H5414>give<s%> me your <S%H3820>heart<s%>, and let your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H7521>observe<s%> my <S%H1870>ways<s%>.
For a <S%H2181>whore<s%> is a <S%H6013>deep<s%> <S%H7745>ditch<s%>; and a strange <S%H5237>woman<s%> is a <S%H6862>narrow<s%> <S%H875>pit<s%>.
She also lies in <S%H693>wait<s%> as for a <S%H2863>prey<s%>, and <S%H3254>increases<s%> the <S%H898>transgressors<s%> among <S%H120>men<s%>.

Who has <S%H188>woe<s%>? who has <S%H17>sorrow<s%>? who has <S%H4079>contentions<s%>? who has <S%H7879>complaints<s%>? who has <S%H6482>wounds<s%> without <S%H2600>cause<s%>? who has <S%H2448>redness<s%> of <S%H5869>eyes<s%>?
They that stay <S%H309>long<s%> at the <S%H3196>wine<s%>; they that <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H2713>seek<s%> mixed <S%H4469>wine<s%>.

<S%H7200>Look<s%> not you upon the <S%H3196>wine<s%> when it is <S%H119>red<s%>, when it <S%H5414>gives<s%> his <S%H5869>colour<s%> in the <S%H3563>cup<s%>, when it <S%H1980>goes<s%> down <S%H4339>smoothly<s%>.
At the <S%H319>last<s%> it <S%H5391>bites<s%> like a <S%H5175>serpent<s%>, and <S%H6567>stings<s%> like a <S%H6848>adder<s%>.
Your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall <S%H7200>behold<s%> strange <S%H2114>women<s%>, and your <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall <S%H1696>utter<s%> perverse <S%H8419>things<s%>.
<S%H7901>Yes<s%>, you shall be as he that lies down in the <S%H3820>middle<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, or as he that <S%H7901>lies<s%> upon the <S%H7218>top<s%> of a <S%H2260>mast<s%>.

They have <S%H5221>stricken<s%> <S%H2470>me<s%>, shall you say, and I was not sick; they have <S%H1986>beaten<s%> <S%H3045>me<s%>, and I felt it <S%H6974>not<s%>: when shall I awake? I will <S%H1245>seek<s%> it yet <S%H3254>again<s%>.
